lead_paragraph: GALLEN--Jill, died at home, peacefully in her sleep, on February 9th at the age of 80. Jill loved her family, her friends, her books, the ballet, and the opera. Most of all, she loved and cared for her husband of 54 years, Richard, who passed away in 2013. She is survived by her two loving children, Jonathan and David, her devoted and admiring daughter-in-law, Amy, and her six adoring grandchildren: Hannah, Samuel, Grace, Harry, Sarah and Nicholas. There will be a service at 10am on Friday, February 12th at the Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 West 76th Street, New York, NY. 1/3
